Title: Zax-Controls
Description: Library of tools that combine jQuery and custom server controls to help make web applications easier.
HomeWiki:
ZaxControls

A set of library tools designed to help web developers quickly create web applications that are easy to use through the use of the jQuery AJAX library.

Current list of controls:

  • DatePicker
  • ListView
  • NoteBox
  • TextBox

For a complete list of planned and existing features review the documentation.

Each tool has their own separate features but all use the following common features:

  • Label - The label describes what the input field is used for in the application eg: Last Name, First Name, etc...
  • Help - Popup dialog that describes the tools function in the application.  This is an option item that when left blank don't show on the page.
  • HelpSrc - Path to the help image to show on the page.
  • CssClass - CSS style class that is put on all the tags.
